title: Acropolis forever
text: Every greek, every european and every citizen of the word should visit the Acropolis. Enjoy the view of Athens at night, from the "vrachakia" area. just 5' from the Monastiraki station

title: Was pretty good, mostly for tourists
text: Mixed feelings, mainly because it was filled with tourists. Will try this again in a less busy time period

title: Amazing food & hospitality
text:
Me and my friends visited Albatross and we all had a great time watching some Premier League games by the pool. The staff & the baristas were all very experienced and friendly.

My favorite thing though was the food. We tried both the buffet and the restaurant and the tastes were unique. Greek food is amazing!

Also, you have to try the fish, I had the best sea-bream of my life here...

title: Best burger in Athens
text:
Best burger in Athens, Greece, Europe? Who knows. Only time can tell :)

Keep up the good work guys :)
